description: The study and performance of selected works from the classical string quartet repertory (by Haydn, Mozart, Beethoven and/or Schubert). Students will work in assigned groups and be assessed on their weekly progress as well as their active participation in the studio class, which will provide an overview of the repertory as well as dimensions of ensemble playing specific to string players. Students are expected to participate in at least one public performance and final examination on one of the prepared movements.
title: Foundations for String Chamber Music
